channel.title: Saw -- The movies
channel.description: Who thinks Saw is the ownage? :D I bought the third dvd just yesterday, I've been dying to see it. There's only a little bit of dying, which makes me disappointed, you would expect more gore from [s]TWISTED[/s] Pictures. So, compared to 1 & 2, my rating for Saw 3 is a 6/10. It lacks the gruesomeness that is Saw. But, on the bright side there's a small twist at the end, which does make for a good thriller. Too bad it lacked the "thrill" part.

item.title: Saw -- The movies
item.dc:creator: @Chase Chase
item.description:
@Chase wrote:

The first one was pretty good, the second was pretty much the best, but i don’t care much for the third one.

Read full topic

item.title: Saw -- The movies
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:17, topic:69125”][quote author=lothy link=topic=101557.msg1049559#msg1049559 date=1174831910]

Theres the link on peekvid to watch it online, dont waste your moeny hiring it.

http://www.peekvid.com/feature/movies/963/SAW-3.html

Dude either your poor or like being infront of the computer.

Man it costs like 5bucks to hire a movie for a week, big deal!

You don’t hire a movie, you rent it.

Theres the link on peekvid to watch it online, dont waste your moeny hiring it.

http://www.peekvid.com/feature/movies/963/SAW-3.html

Dude either your poor or like being infront of the computer.

Man it costs like 5bucks to hire a movie for a week, big deal!

Actuallly yeah i am very poor. Why wlak to the video store and pay them £5 for a video that only cost them £5 and i dont get to keep it. When i can watch it for free without the effort of having to get it, pay for it and return it.

Very lazy…

The words are synonymous, so it hardly matters which you use.

And $5 gets you a movie for a day, not a week. Rip off considering I’m already expecting it to be a shit movie.
[/quote]

tOOT tOOT quote train coming through.

lazy does not equal poor.[/quote]
but alot of poor people are lazy

Read full topic

item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

i watched it earlier tonight, was very dissappointed.

If its gore your after try “apocalpto” its non stop brutality and torture of women children and me.
The blood and the torture arnt the scariest parts, its faces a glee on the onlooking crowd as 10’s of people are diemboweled and beheaded.
The idea of a crowd of people smiling at the scares me shitless.

Who thinks Saw is the ownage?
I bought the third dvd just yesterday, I’ve been dying to see it.
There’s only a little bit of dying, which makes me disappointed, you would expect more gore from TWISTED Pictures.
So, compared to 1 & 2, my rating for Saw 3 is a 6/10. It lacks the gruesomeness that is Saw. But, on the bright side there’s a small twist at the end, which does make for a good thriller. Too bad it lacked the “thrill” part.
